definition: Ceres, dwarf planet in the asteroid belt between Mars and Jupiter, discovered in 1801 by G. Piazzi

sentences.english: Indeed, Ceres may have ice caps and a thin atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 實際上，穀神星可能有冰層覆蓋而且大氣稀薄。

sentences.english: Ceres and Vesta will make for interesting subjects.
sentences.chinese: 穀神星和竈神星都將成爲吸引人的課題。

sentences.english: The Ceres 70 includes sleeping pad straps and dual ice tool tubes.
sentences.chinese: 穀神星70配有睡袋壓縮帶和一對冰鎬環。
